Hi Lasse!

> There is duplication between the two strings but the refactoring
> (putting the bits into a String array) removed the duplication at the
> cost of readability. And, sometimes, readability trumps duplication.

I would be *very* reluctant to accept that. I can't remember an instance 
where, when at first sight it seemed like accepting duplication improved 
readability, I couldn't come up with a more appropriate design that was 
both readable and duplication-free. Most often, I just missed an 
important insight.

Cheers, Ilja
